about_the_game:
Transparent Pack

This pack offers outfits for fashion-conscious survivors.
Cover up outfits you don't want to be seen.

The Transparent Pack includes the following items:

Transparent Ring
Transparent Cloak
Transparent Bag

How to apply a Skin to Equipment

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore.
